meta.title: TURFu — Infrastructure for the next paradigm
meta.description: Transdisciplinary metastructure aligning ethics, collective intelligence, and decentralized technologies to transform human coordination.
meta.keywords: metaethics, governance, transparency, DAO, Web3, collective intelligence, transdisciplinarity

hero.subtitle: Metaethics · Governance · Transparency · Action
hero.description: TURFu is a transdisciplinary metastructure aligning ethics, collective intelligence, and decentralized technologies to transform human coordination.

problem.title: Why now?
problem.point_1_desc: Knowledge-producing institutions are losing legitimacy. Consensus as authority no longer suffices.
problem.point_2_desc: Faced with systemic complexity, inherited governance models show their limits.
problem.point_3_desc: AI and DLTs are transforming proof, reputation and coordination — without a robust ethical framework.

vision.title: A metastructure for action
vision.intro: TURFu offers a transdisciplinary framework and concrete tools to build transformation trajectories — individual, organizational, societal.

ecosystem.title: Multi-layer architecture
ecosystem.layer0_desc: Charter, standards, coherence, arbitration of value conflicts.
ecosystem.layer1_desc: Acceleration of aligned projects, transparent allocation, shared tech infrastructure (SDK).
ecosystem.layer2_desc: Concrete implementation: communities, services, third places, open science.

principles.title: Founding principles
principles.p1_desc: Beyond dogmatism and relativism: robust, traceable, revisable legitimacy.
principles.p2_desc: Traceability of decisions, budgets, contributions. Proof-of-process.
principles.p3_desc: Coordination through signals and traces — not vertical command.
principles.p4_desc: Data under individual control. Privacy by design.

cta.title: Join the movement
cta.contributor_desc: Join Discord, contribute to the Manifesto.
cta.builder_desc: Propose an aligned project via OZAM.

architecture.title: TURFU Ecosystem
architecture.subtitle: A coherent framework to address the crises of our time, fostering innovation in service of humanity and the living world.
architecture.layer0_desc: Ethical foundation and financial engine of the ecosystem. Funds projects aligned with TURFU's vision: open science, commons, ecological sustainability, collective intelligence. Addresses existential risks of our time.
architecture.layer1_desc: Incubator for decentralized projects aligned with TURFU's vision. Develops new forms of governance, economies and social structures that are smarter, decentralized and commons-friendly.
architecture.layer2_legal: Internal projects (same level as L1 incubated projects)
architecture.layer2_desc: Projects developed internally by TURFU, essential for maintaining strategic coherence and ethical balance of the overall architecture. Embody values and vision, serve as vital components for system harmony.
architecture.module_ethics_desc: Founding principles, third way, human dignity, well-being of future generations
architecture.module_funding_desc: Donations, grants, patronage — redistribution to aligned L1/L2 projects
architecture.module_commons_desc: Support for open source initiatives, common goods, shared knowledge
architecture.module_governance_desc: Decision framework, alignment criteria, layer supervision
architecture.module_incubation_desc: Support for decentralized projects: open science, ethical AI, food systems, tokenized forests...
architecture.module_toolkits_desc: Ethical resources, governance tools, DAO templates
architecture.module_tokenomics_desc: Tokenized local economies, shared governance, aligned incentives
architecture.module_collective_intel_desc: Distributed decision-making, content curation, decentralized coordination
architecture.module_open_science_desc: Open peer review platform, decentralized collaboration, transdisciplinary knowledge sharing
architecture.module_memo_desc: AI-assisted collaborative curation, immutable history, verified knowledge base
architecture.module_talk_desc: Nuanced deliberation, contextual debates, emergent consensus
architecture.module_curator_desc: Professional interface, reputation system, integrated training
architecture.concept_1_desc: Each layer adapts its legal structure to its environment: association / Endowment Fund for L0, DAO for L1, internal projects for L2.
architecture.concept_2_desc: Despite layer separation, the ecosystem functions as an integrated whole, with constant flows of information and governance.
architecture.concept_3_desc: The architecture aims for an intelligent, decentralized governance model fundamentally aligned with the well-being of people and the planet.
architecture.quote: You never change things by fighting the existing reality. To change something, build a new model that makes the existing model obsolete.
